001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.ScriptType;
004import org.bitcoinj.crypto.ECKey;
005import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
006import org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptPattern;
007
008import java.util.Arrays;
009import java.util.Optional;
010
011/**
012 * A simple transaction signer using a single ECKey that can sign either
013 * {@link ScriptType#P2PKH} or {@link ScriptType#P2WPKH} transactions.
014 */
015public class ECKeySigner implements BaseTransactionSigner {
016    private final ECKey ecKey;
017
018    /**
019     * Construct a signer from a single key
020     * @param ecKey signing key
021     */
022    public ECKeySigner(ECKey ecKey) {
023        this.ecKey = ecKey;
024    }
025
026    /**
027     * Return the signing key for an input, if available
028     * @param input Transaction input data
029     * @return Signing key, if available, {@link Optional#empty()} otherwise.
030     */
031    public Optional<ECKey> keyForInput(TransactionInputData input) {
032        Script s = input.script();
033        return  ((ScriptPattern.isP2PKH(s) || ScriptPattern.isP2WPKH(s)) && Arrays.equals(s.getPubKeyHash(), ecKey.getPubKeyHash()))
034                ? Optional.of(ecKey)
035                : Optional.empty();
036    }
037}
